##  Integrating Microbiome and CyTOF data

High-throughput technologies have revolutionized the quantification of human diseases with molecular and biological multiple mediators. The data produced by these techniques are complex in nature because of high-dimensionality, heterogeneity, multidomain, and dependency.
I am currently working on establishing a data structure and workflow for storing, processing, transforming multidomain data.
